InvalidSessionToken.Detail: The jwt might be expired or with a wrong format

ClaimNotFound.Detail: This might mean an internal error or a token with a bad format

EntityNotFound.Message: The requested entity was not found
EntityNotFound.Detail: Make sure the id is valid

AuthenticationFailed.Detail: The username or password is incorrect

EmailAlreadyTaken.Detail: The email is already taken by another user

DatabaseError.Detail: Database operation failed, check the logs for more details, most likely id was not found
